backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, projects, tasks, preferences, and statistics using OrderedMap and various domain types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required UI fixes, involved files, components, and test IDs for dark theme and task page improvements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style mapping of frontend file paths to short summaries describing component roles and recent UI or logic updates.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point defining PWA metadata, icons, manifest, and script mount for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, icons, and startup configuration for Impact Forge.
frontend/public/service-worker.ts: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, network-first fetch strategy, and cache cleanup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, routing between sections, global dark theme, task drawer, service worker registration, and profile setup flow.
frontend/src/components/CreateProjectDia: Dialog for creating projects with name, icon, and color selection, submitting via useCreateProject.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Modal form for creating tasks, handling input, project selection, priority, and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Displays empty-state UI for no projects or no tasks and triggers project creation dialog when needed.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive app header with navigation, date controls, section switching, and user menu including logout.
frontend/src/components/HistoryPage.tsx: Lists completed tasks with search, sorting, project lookup, and optional task selection callback.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Handles PWA install prompts for web and iOS, managing deferred events, dismissal, and install state.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login page showcasing app branding, features, and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/LongFormTaskEdit: Rich text editor component for detailed task descriptions using ReactQuill with custom toolbar.
frontend/src/components/MainContent.tsx: Renders day, week, or month views based on viewMode and passes date and task selection handlers to them.
frontend/src/components/OverviewPage.tsx: Fetches and displays productivity insights, project stats, and loading/empty states for the overview dashboard.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/ProjectsOverview: Displays all projects with expandable sections, project creation, and deletion, and lists tasks per project.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Displays a single task with completion toggle, quick edit, delete options, and project/due‑date info.
frontend/src/components/TaskDrawer.tsx: Slide‑in drawer listing tasks with search, quick‑add functionality, and task selection handling.
frontend/src/components/TaskEditDialog.t: Dialog for editing a task’s fields including title, description, due date, project, and priority.
frontend/src/components/TaskPage.tsx: Task detail editor that loads a task, allows editing title, content, due date, and priority, and saves updates via mutations.
frontend/src/components/views/DayView.ts: Displays tasks for a specific day grouped by overdue, upcoming, and completed, with sorting and task creation support.
Monthly calendar view that shows tasks per day, highlights overdue items, and allows navigating to day view or selecting tasks.
frontend/src/components/views/WeekView.t: Weekly grid showing tasks for each day with overdue detection and a dialog for creating new tasks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing identity state to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and mutate user profiles, projects, and tasks via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, CSS variables, dark mode theming, scrollbar styles, and rich‑text editor styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, theming, plugins, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, features, and known UI issues for the task management app.
